'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The peak and the vantage point from which [[Menzzago]] rules over his domain across the [[Splintered Reef]], decorated with coffins and even a dining table.

A glowing sphere of energy in the center of the area serves as a focusing point for the spell of illusion that is cast over the reef and its people.

==Points of interest==
* A small area, where you have the sacrificial pool used by Menzzago to keep his vessels active. After dispatching him, you can shatter the orb to turn the undead into mindless husks again.

==Characters==
* [[Menzzago]], master of this strange domain.

==Loot==
* [[Amaliorra]], [[Spider Silk Robe]]: Dropped by Menzzago.
